snippet: Ignacio Zamora Jr., a supervisor, was removed from President Obama’s security detail after being accused of leaving a bullet in a woman’s hotel room, officials said.
abstract: Secret Service supervisor Ignacio Zamora Jr is removed from Pres Obama's security detail and demoted after being accused of leaving a bullet in a woman's room at a luxury hotel near the White House.
lead_paragraph: Ignacio Zamora Jr., a supervisor, was removed from President Obama’s security detail after being accused of leaving a bullet in a woman’s hotel room, officials said.

headline.main: Secret Service Officer Is Demoted From Presidential Detail
